Department of Natural Resources/Resource Assessment Service,Chesapeake Bay Commission,Chesapeake Bay Commission,21401,2009,225000,"The commission was formed in 1980 by the General Assembles of Maryland and Virginia to assist the states in cooperatively managing the Chesapeake Bay.  In 1985, the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania joined the Commission.  The Commission is a signatory to the Chesapeake Bay Agreement, which serves as the framework for the multi-jurisdictional Chesapeake Bay Program. The Commission serves as the legislative arm of the Chesapeake bay program and is therefore fully involved in the restoration and protection of the Chesapeake Bay.",Grant,1,06/30/2009 12:00:00 AM

MARYLAND DEPARTMENT OF NATURAL RESOURCES/RESOURCE ASSESSMENT SERVICE,CHESAPEAKE BAY COMMISSION,Chesapeake Bay Commission,21401,2020,300000,"THE COMMISSION WAS FORMED IN 1980 BY THE GENERAL ASSEMBLES OF MARYLAND AND VIRGINIA TO ASSIST THE STATES IN COOPERATIVELY MANAGING THE CHESAPEAKE BAY.  IN 1985, THE COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA JOINED THE COMMISSION.  THE COMMISSION IS A SIGNATORY TO THE CHESAPEAKE BAY AGREEMENT, WHICH SERVES AS THE FRAMEWORK FOR THE MULTI-JURISDICTIONAL CHESAPEAKE BAY PROGRAM. THE COMMISSION SERVES AS THE LEGISLATIVE ARM OF THE CHESAPEAKE BAY PROGRAM AND IS THEREFORE FULLY INVOLVED IN THE RESTORATION AND PROTECTION OF THE CHESAPEAKE BAY.",Grant,1,06/30/2020 12:00:00 AM
